UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Targeted engineering of the antibacterial peptide apidaecin, based on an in vivo monitoring assay system.
Literature.Author: Taguchi S, Mita K, Ichinohe K, Hashimoto S

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli JM109(MIC=2.5µM),Escherichia coli BL21(DE3)(MIC=0.313µM),Pseudomonas putida GPp104(MIC=3.13µM),Cupriavidus necator H16(MIC=10µM),Bacillus subtilis 168(no activity data)
